messages.subject: Re: british pound
messages.msgSnippet: Mary Ellen a sight I found is called Universal currency converter http://www.xe.net/ucc/ I am sure there are others. BTW a great search tool I use for research
messages.messageBody:
Mary Ellen a sight I found is called Universal currency converter
http://www.xe.net/ucc/
I am sure there are others. BTW a great search tool I use for research is
known as dogpile
www.dogpile.com
